thread.title: Nichola

author: Nichola
title: Nichola
text:
I purchased a replacement visor for my helmet in December, at the beginning of February I noticed two cracks coming from the pin-lock holes, I emailed Helmet City who advised me that the visor will need to be returned to be inspected. So I posted the faulty visor back to them.
A few days later I received an email stating that they had received the visor, an hour later Another email was received informing me that they have reimbursed the postage that I'd paid, shortly after this another email arrived to let me know that the visor would be replaced, also giving the details of the delivery date with an hour time slot. The visor was delivered yesterday as promised. The after sales support I've had from Helmet City has been brilliant. I would happily recommend them.
